short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Countdown time remaining in the day, week, month, year, or a custom date.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab Countdown replaces the default new tab with customizable countdowns. You can add or remove countdowns, and can select a time remaining format (in seconds, minutes, hours, days, or weeks) and a specified end date (day, week, month, year, or a custom date and description) for each countdown.
